activities: Personal data received in the course of Pingmd's activities (such as providing various business services and technical support, enabling sales and other transactions, conducting data analysis to improve products and services, and sales and marketing for products and services), including health information and other data related to prospective, current and former users, suppliers and partners.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online and offline user, prospect, partner and supplier data; services data; medical and health data; including manually processed data
